title: Cinco de Mayo
description: Fiesta, Fiesta! Come party at the Padre Hotel for Cinco de Mayo! Head up the Prairie Fire rooftop for from 7-10pm for live music from SV Magicko. Keep your tummy full - we'll be serving up festive food and drink faves all day. Olé!

banner_image.name: Padre_CincoDeMayo_937x400
banner_image.alt: Brown, yellow and red artwork that reads Cinco de Mayo and includes flowers and a guitar
